title: Making an Appointment
description: Learn basic phrases for scheduling a meeting or appointment.

theorySlides.title: Requesting a Meeting
theorySlides.content:
When you need to see a manager or client, you must ask politely.

- **Are you available at 10:00?**
- **Can we meet tomorrow?**
- **I would like to make an appointment.**

theorySlides.title: Confirming the Time
theorySlides.content:
Once you agree on a time, confirm it:

- **That works for me.**
- **See you then.**
- **Okay, 2:00 PM is fine.**

interactiveCheck.question: 'Are you available?' means 'Are you free to meet?'
interactiveCheck.explanation: 'Available' is a professional way to say you are free or not busy.
